definition: ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous

sentences.english: In addition, it attaches great importance to the development of naval and air forces and strengthen our offshore delivery.
sentences.chinese: 另外，它非常注重發展海空軍力量，加強遠洋投送。

sentences.english: The United States has also been upgrading forward deployed naval and air forces in Guam.
sentences.chinese: 同時，美國也一直在加強其在關島部署的海空軍力量。

sentences.english: Mobilize all land, sea and air forces for a nation-wide war of resistance.
sentences.chinese: 動員全國陸海空軍，實行全國抗戰。

sentences.english: The Chinese are second rate sailors and airmen.
sentences.chinese: 中國的海空軍只是二流貨色。

sentences.english: Hawaii is a military base at Pearl Harbor, such big and base.
sentences.chinese: 夏威夷是軍事要地，有珍珠港等大的海空軍基地。

sentences.english: The second part says that “land, sea and air forces will never be maintained.
sentences.chinese: 第二部分規定，“永遠不保持陸海空軍部隊”。

sentences.english: We're not seeing afundamental shift in budget from the Army to the Air Force and Navy.
sentences.chinese: 我們沒有發現基本預算從陸軍轉到海空軍。
